appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Automatically add tabs to your configured groups, based on their URL.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

previewTitle.description: The title of the preview tab in the edit dialog.

headlineAdvanced.description: The headline of the advanced settings section in the edit dialog.

checkboxStrict.description: The label of the strict checkbox in the edit dialog.

checkboxStrictDescription.message: Remove tabs from this group if their URL no longer matches.
checkboxStrictDescription.description: The description of the strict checkbox in the edit dialog.

checkboxMerge.description: The label of the single window checkbox in the edit dialog.

checkboxMergeDescription.message: Prevent creating instances of this group in different windows, move tabs into existing groups in other windows instead.
checkboxMergeDescription.description: The description of the single window checkbox in the edit dialog.

priorityLabel.description: The label for the priority input field in the edit dialog.

priorityDescription.message: Higher numbers take precedence over lower numbers (0-100)
priorityDescription.description: The description of the priority field in the edit dialog.

priorityPlaceholder.description: The placeholder for the priority input field.

noGroupTitle.description: A group with an empty title

editGroupTooltip.description: The tooltip for the edit group button

newMatcherTooltip.description: The tooltip for the new matcher button

invalidUrlPattern.description: Error message for invalid URL pattern

groupDeletedNotice.description: Snackbar message when group was deleted

headlineImport.description: The import headline of the import/export settings dialog.

headlineExport.description: The import headline of the import/export settings dialog.

importFormatError.message: The file to be imported contains invalid grouping rules.
importFormatError.description: Error message when imported file is not valid JSON or does not match the schema

importDiscardWarning.message: Preexisting grouping rules will be discarded.

groupTitlePlaceholder.description: Placeholder of a group title input

furtherUrlInputPlaceholder.description: Placeholder of URL input beyond the first one

newGroupTitle.description: Title of a newly created group

duplicateGroupError.message: This combination of group name and color already exists.
duplicateGroupError.description: Error message when a group with the same name and color already exists

sortHint.message: The order of groups determines the order of pattern evaluation. Put groups with more specific patterns to the top to allow groups with more permissive patterns to serve as a fallback.
sortHint.description: Hint to show when sort mode is enabled

settingsTransferConfigurationTitle.description: Title of the transfer configuration section

settingsTransferConfigurationSubtitle.description: Subtitle of the transfer configuration section

settingsForceReloadTitle.description: Title of the force reload section

settingsForceReloadSubtitle.message: Feel like the extension is stuck or rule changes are not applied properly? Try this.
settingsForceReloadSubtitle.description: Subtitle of the force reload section

derivedNameChromePage.description: Description of a generic Chrome-specific page

derivedNameChromeFlags.description: Description of the Chrome Flags page

derivedNameChromeNewtab.description: Description of the Chrome New Tab page

derivedNameChromeExactUrl.description: Description of an exactly matching Chrome-specific page

derivedNameExtensionHost.description: Description of a specific Chrome extension

derivedNameHttpDomain.description: Description of an HTTP domain pattern

derivedNameHttpSubdomain.description: Description of an HTTP domain and subdomain pattern

popupAddLink.description: Add pattern button in a popup

popupCreateGroup.description: Create Group item in the popup menu select

popupSaveButton.description: Save button for new URL patterns item in a popup

popupMoreOptions.description: Button to go to options page from a popup
